= Introduction =
This program is optimized for Android tablet and promise to bring you the best Flickr viewing experience possible. 

= Main Features =
Browse Daily Interesting Photos;
Browse Your Photostream
Browse Your Contacts' Photostream
View Image with Full Exif and Comments
View your recent activities, like comments on your photos, comments on photos you commented
Save a photo to your local sd card, and set it as the wallpaper
Share any pictures with your friends via G+, Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Sina Weibo and many more.

Please go to android market for screenshots. [http://market.android.com/details?id=com.gmail.charleszq]
